org.jruyi.io

Interface IUnitChain


  • public interface IUnitChain
    A chain of buffer units. It has a position pointer used to iterate the buffer units in this chain. It provides a low level interface to operate the data in a buffer consisting of a chain of buffer units.
    See Also:
    IBuffer, IBufferFactory

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void append(IUnit unit)
      Appends the specified unit to the end of this chain.
      IUnit create()
      Returns a new buffer unit.
      IUnit currentUnit()
      Returns the buffer unit the position pointer is pointing to.
      IUnit firstUnit()
      Returns the first buffer unit in this chain
      IUnit lastUnit()
      Returns the last buffer unit in this chain.
      IUnit nextUnit()
      The buffer unit following the current one becomes the current by forwarding the position pointer, and is returned.
      void prepend(IUnit unit)
      Prepends the specified unit to the head of this chain.

        Returns:

        Appends the specified unit to the end of this chain.

      • prepend

        Prepends the specified unit to the head of this chain.
        Parameters:
